amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore time limits in which the Financial Stability Oversight Council must review and make a determination on regulations issued by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-172 to restore time limits in which the Financial Stability Oversight Council must review and make a determination on regulations issued by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 240 (Roll no. 617).
